name: QuotationoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, ask daily quotation, what is the daily quotation”
”Alexa, ask daily quotation to tell me quotation of the day”
”Alexa, ask daily quotation to offer me a quotation”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily quotation
des:
This app is used for learning some advisory quotes while entertaining. 

Getting Started:
- Open "Daily Quotation" skill page on Alexa app or alexa.amazon.com
- Click Enable Skill button
- Now, you can use skill with example phrases

To get daily quotation just say:
- Alexa, ask daily quotation, what is the daily quotation
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
